slide.title: Multibyte Strings
slide.blurb: To deal with multibyte characters and encodings (such as Japanese and Korean) you may use the %mbstring% extension.

list.title: What does Mbstring provide?
list.bullet: Support for ASCII, JIS, Shift-JIS, EUC-(JP|CN|TW|KR), UTF8, Big5, CP866, CP936, CP1251, Koi8r encodings
Replacement for many of PHP's standard string handling functions.
Transparent encoding handlers via PHP's output handling mechanism
